title: Urate crystals: Why you may see them in your baby's diaper
author: Elizabeth Dougherty
description: Urate crystals leave a pink or red-orange stain in your newborn's diaper. They're often no cause for concern, but they could mean your baby is dehydrated.
cleaned_text: What does it mean if my baby has urate crystals in their diaper? Was this article helpful?
